/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and green, reflecting the overcast sky and the lush greenery of the trees.
